thread.title: Sibila

author: Sibila
title: Sibila
text: I do not think that is normal to have the same shoes for 3 years with the same price as I have seen in some of the shops. Unless you are selling vintage which is not the case. So you go and buy some pair of expensive shoes which are 3 years old and are being sold for the same price. The normal thing to do is to discount the material you have left from other seasons instead of tricking the customer.
